title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 151-4.3 - Reserve amounts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 151-4.3 - Reserve amounts

State Regulations

Any insurer, self-insured employer, or the State Insurance Fund that enters into a waiver agreement shall establish reserves for those claims in accordance with Insurance Law sections 1303 and 4117(d). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
151-4.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
